titles.title: A bill to require that the Department of Veterans Affairs adjudicate and resolve certain claims relating to medical malpractice in the health care services provided by the Department.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S2502-2504, S2507)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans.

calendar.text: Committee on Veterans. Provisions of measure incorporated into measure S. 1908 ordered to be reported.

bill.summary: 3/8/1994--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to: (1) determine whether the injury of any veteran as a result of medical treatment was caused by medical malpractice by the Department of Veterans Affairs; and (2) if so, provide appropriate compensation.
